post.body:
Anybody have any clue why they have this or what the purpose of doing 1000 timer checks is for.

I'm just curious because I was working on a profiling timer for Open Game Library that does pretty much the same thing with clock ticks but I wanted to know if this is something necessary because as far as I can tell with or without it I have gotten the same value, then again I've only gotten a difference of 0 (meaning the func(s) I've tested don't take very long).
